definitions: Presenting (someone or something) to another for the first time.
Bringing (something) into use or operation for the first time.
Making (something) known for the first time.
Preceding (a main part) with an opening section.
examples: She is introducing her new colleague to the team.
The company is introducing a new product next month.
He is introducing a new concept in his lecture.
The doctor is introducing a catheter into the vein.
The speaker is introducing the main topic with an anecdote.
